Introduction
Environmental
Social
Governance
2022 Sustainability goals
• Implement the Global Reporting Initiative (GRI) framework  
for assessing the materiality and status of our ESG program.
• Monitor and improve sustainability assessment scores  
by engaging company stakeholders in the process.
• Reduce energy and water consumption.
• Increase the visibility of the CSR Program both inside 
 and outside of the company.
• Verify emissions reporting for Scopes 1 and 2 as a base to define targets.
• Establish a baseline for Scope 3 “Use of Sold Products”.
• Define targets for Scope 2 and Scope 3 “Use of Sold Products”.
• Purchase Scope 1 offsets.
• Acquire external verification of CDP report.
• Submit commitment letter to SBTi.
• Increase purchase of renewable energy.
For reported emissions numbers see CDP section of this report.
